hero.label: PDAO Research
hero.title: Unlock Web3 with Clarity
hero.subtitle: PDAO creates the future of decentralization through POSTECH-based blockchain research and projects.

sections.communitySubtitle: Connect with blockchain enthusiasts, researchers, and developers at POSTECH

simperby.whatIsDesc: A brand new blockchain engine we're building. Simperby is PDAO's core project, developing an innovative blockchain engine.
simperby.howWorksDesc: Governance, P2P Communication, and Consensus. Learn about Simperby's protocol and how it works.
simperby.governanceDesc: We implement a democratic system where all participants can participate in decision-making through on-chain governance.
simperby.p2pDesc: We optimize inter-node communication through efficient P2P network protocols and ensure network scalability.
simperby.consensusDesc: We ensure network security and stability through Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus algorithm.
simperby.innovativeEngineDesc: Simperby is a new blockchain engine being developed by PDAO. With decentralized governance, P2P communication, and consensus algorithms at its core, it provides a more efficient and scalable blockchain solution.
simperby.modularDesignDesc: Simperby adopts a modular architecture, allowing each component to be independently upgraded and customized. Written in Rust, it ensures both safety and performance.
simperby.contributeDesc: Want to contribute to the Simperby project? Join us in creating the future of blockchain.

about.description: PDAO creates the future of decentralization through POSTECH-based blockchain research and projects.
about.intro1: PDAO is a crypto and blockchain community based at POSTECH (Pohang University of Science and Technology).
about.intro2: PDAO started in early 2022 as a crypto community and open-source development group at POSTECH. Based on the identity of 'a DAO that opens DAOs,' we have developed Simperby, a decentralized DAO protocol, and have hosted ourselves through it. We have also contributed to the blockchain industry as a development organization through various hackathon participations and the 2023 Ministry of Science and ICT's open-source contribution project.
about.intro3: As of 2025, PDAO is a community that anyone can freely participate in. Those interested in the blockchain ecosystem can plan and participate in various activities to contribute to this industry and grow their careers.

profile.joinDesc: We are recruiting talented individuals to create the future of blockchain with PDAO.
profile.joinPdaoDesc: We welcome anyone interested in blockchain technology and decentralization.

assets.assetsDesc: Feel free to download and use PDAO's brand assets.

footer.description: POSTECH-based blockchain research and development community
